page.title: 01General Description
page.content: Our area is in Staffordshire but it is on the borders of Cheshire and Derbyshire. In the north west corner of our area is a bridge at the three shire heads. When you cross the bridge you can go in all the three counties. The Buxton to Leek road passes through our area. We have some houses scattered around the hills. In the village of Flash we have a shop which sells fruit and sweets and milk and all kinds of things. We have a pub and it has a bar. In winter it is very cold because it is the highest village in England. We have a church, we sing in church. We have a village Hall and a school.
